ABOUT US

Our story

OUR

HISTORY

MSS for schools was founded by groupe of friends as desire to help children to be educated .
The model was simple: to engage their partners in the real estate community to give
a portion of their income to build schools for families in developing countries.


In a short amount of time, individuals and companies made generosity a part of their business model
by giving to MSS SCHOOLS. Now, donors from all walks of life are giving to provide schools to children
in need. We are currently working in 4 countries with ministry partners that know and serve the people
of their communities.

WE

BELIEVE

  • We believe that we are global citizens connecting to a purpose bigger than ourselves.
  • Education is vital to a child living a full life and reaching their potential.
  • We believe that every child has the right to a quality education, no matter their circumstances.
    Every school can be a vibrant school community that puts children first.
  • Every child deserves a chance to survive, a chance to learn, a chance to dream.

SCHOOL DESIGN

Sustainble + Authentic

THE SCHOOLS

WE BUILD

At SSM SChools, it’s important to us that the style of a school meets the cultural expectations
of a community. That’s why we use locally-sourced materials for our schools. We collaborate with
local leadership to receive design approval, and each school is inspected at completion to meet
our quality standards.

EVERY HOME OFFERS

KEY FEATURES

concrete floor

Every school starts with a concrete floor, laying the foundation for a healthy and clean environment.

Solid Roof Surface

solid roof protects students from weather elements and eliminates roof leaks.

Strong Walls

Brick, concrete, or stucco walls built to stand the test of time and provide a legacy of shelter.

Door & Window Locks

Locking doors and windows allow students to work in peace without fear..

Rain Water Systems

Rain-catch water systems are installed at the schoolsite if disability hinders travel to local well

Entrance Ramps

Entrance ramps are installed for elderly and students with disabilities to provide accessibility.

YOUR DONATIONS,

Go 100%, Directly to the Field

WE PROVE

EVERY PROJECT

Thanks to our generous board and a few designated donors - all operating expenses of our
organization are underwritten and taken care of outside of donor funds. That means
that your generous donations go 100% toward building homes!




Learn How We
PROVE
EVERY PROJECT

YOU GIVE
GENEROUSLY

We serve as a catalyst to connect generous individuals
and their finances to the pressing needs of students. The
cost of an entire school is $20,000, and with our 100%
Giving Model, every dollar goes towards school
construction. However, we believe when you give, you’re
investing in so much more than bricks and concrete.

WE
BUILD IT

Our local labor teams construct each school
with locally sourced materials. And once the school
is complete, the students are presented with
their new school. That is the highlight of our ministry.

WE
PROVE IT

We prove our projects in 3 core ways:

  1. to our Community Sponsors, who give a total school(s),
    we match funds and send you details of the students you
    helped provide a good life
  2. to our general sponsors, we share photos through our
    social media and email newsletters.
  3. we are totally transparent with our financials. You can
    see where your money goes through Guidestar, and we
    are certified with their platinum level of transparency.

MSS SCHOOLS

CONTACT OUR STAFF

We're available and happy to connect with you and answer any questions you have about our
mission and ways that you can get involved!
